name: Princess Makeup Mania
description:
The fashion fantasy fever is back with Princess Makeup Mania. The princess is lonely up in her cold royal castle. Royal doll has no one who can take care of her & you are her only hope. Can you please help her because princess has to attend the farewell party at high school and become the best royal stylist? The princess needs your help to look like a beautiful royal doll & a fashionable queen. So Unleash your style in the world of elite fashion and be a top royal doll Stylist, you have to do a spa first, than you have to do dress her in a designer’s fashion mania dress, try on the classic and noble fashion clothes and accessories, and princess will be the focus of the party. Help the girl get ready for the farewell mania party at high school by using the special and branded beauty cosmetics at makeover salon mania. From professional facial makeup to eye make up, blushes, eye shadow, face tattoos, lip stick, endless designs of earrings and much more at makeup salon. Use countless makeover games items for true beauty queen care in one of the amazing makeup mania games.

Express your fashion fantasies and unique style you covet with fabulous stylist items that fill your closet. Turn your Princess into a beauty queen in Princess Makeup Mania with new hairstyles and fabulous fashion makeup games! Start with a soothing spa to make sure the princess’s hair and skin are flawless already to show up in the farewell party at high school. Cleanse, scrub and moisturize her skin using high end makeover treatments at makeover salon. Have mud musk to remove impurities and finish with toner to brighten skin! Now the face becomes clean instantly. Next, apply mask, remove acnes and remove naps of eyebrow. Wash the face with soap until bubbles cover all over the face and then rinse the face. Now let’s come to the makeup salon. Give the princess a good-looking hairstyle first. Apply blush on, eye shadow and mascara. Try on different colors of lipstick and gloss in salon to find the best one. Enhance natural beauty of frozen girl with eyeshades, eyelashes, and blush on. Better not miss any of them in order to make frozen girl the most beautiful.

Princess Makeup Mania Features:

* Start frozen princess's makeover by choosing the best hair color & hairstyles at girl makeover salon
* Try wonderful colored contact lens
* Apply glitter blush-on
* Enhance girl’s eyes by applying eyeliner, eyelashes, eye shadow, lipstick, eyebrow, Finish with mascara in girl makeup salon
* Beautify frozen girl’s face by applying perfect-matching glitter blush on and sparkling lipstick
* Plentiful shoes of different styles to choose
* Lastly enhance beautiful eyes by apply eyeliner and mascara
* Choose a charming gorgeous outfit from the countless pretty outfits
* Countless makeup items to create charming & glamorous looks for girls makeover at salon
* A huge variety of decoration items, including earrings, necklaces, bracelets, and headgears to choose
